body.name: MFASCO Vehicle First Aid Kit - Compact Metal Kit - Portable & Mountable - Safety Kit for Commercial Vehicles & Workplace - DOT ANSI OSHA Compliant - Includes 115 Pcs Work Essential First Aid Supplies
features: WORKPLACE VEHICLE FIRST AID KIT: Specially designed for commercial vehicles, semi-trucks, work vans, and remote job sites, this kit is compliant with DOT (Department of Transportation) regulations. It provides essential medical supplies tailored for use in work vehicles and trucks, ensuring safety and preparedness in challenging environments.

PORTABLE & MOUNTABLE CONVENIENCE: Tailored for use in work vehicles and trucks, this compact metal kit is highly portable for easy transportation and can be securely mounted in your commercial vehicle or work truck. Its durable construction ensures supplies stay intact during travel and offers quick access when needed.

ESSENTIAL SUPPLIES: Be ready for workplace emergencies with our comprehensive first aid kit. Packed with 115 carefully selected medical pieces, including bandages, gauze, antiseptic wipes, and tweezers, this kit addresses a wide range of injuries common in commercial work trucks and remote job sites.

SECURED FIRST AID KIT: Equipped with a reliable waterproof seal, this compact metal kit ensures your essential medical supplies are protected during work-related journeys, be it on the road or at remote locations. Its rugged construction makes it a dependable companion for workers on the go.

QUICK ACCESS for WORKSITE SAFETY: In emergencies, time is critical. This kit's organized interior enables quick access to essential first aid supplies. Store it in your work vehicle's glove compartment, backpack, or drawer, ensuring vital supplies are within reach whenever you need them, enhancing safety for workers on remote job sites and in commercial vehicles.

Compliant with DOT (Department of Transportation) regulations, this compact metal kit ensures preparedness and safety in challenging environments. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 60 Years of Safety Excellence: MFASCO Health & Safety We are a Michigan-based small business providing first aid and safety solutions for over 60 years. From manufacturers to schools, we’re your shield in emergencies. Trust us for top-tier supplies, and a promise: Safety made simple - Introducing MFASCO, your trusted source for first aid supplies. Swift Safety Access: In emergencies, our kit's organized interior ensures rapid access to essential first aid supplies, boosting safety for workers in remote job sites and commercial vehicles. MFASCO Vehicle First Aid Kit: Essential Safety for Work on Wheels Compact Metal Kit for Commercial Vehicles & Job Sites - DOT ANSI OSHA Compliant Designed exclusively for commercial vehicles, semi-trucks, work vans, and remote job sites, the MFASCO Vehicle First Aid Kit is a reliable companion for workers on the go. Compliant with DOT (Department of Transportation) regulations, this compact metal kit ensures preparedness and safety in challenging environments. Tailored for Work Vehicles: Designed for work vehicles and trucks, this portable metal kit ensures easy access to vital supplies with secure mounting options. omprehensive 112-Piece Supplies: Packed with medical essentials, including bandages, gauze, wipes, and tweezers, addressing injuries in commercial work trucks and remote job sites. Secured for the Journey: With a reliable waterproof seal, this kit protects essential medical supplies during work-related journeys, ensuring durability on the go.

Mobile Armor: Tailored for work vehicles, our compact first aid is your on-the-move safety solution, always ready to roll. Regulation Ready: DOT, ANSI, OSHA – we speak their language. This kit is not just compliant; it's safety's BFF, meeting all the standards you need. 112 Pieces of Preparedness: From paper cuts to bumps and scrapes, we've got you covered with a comprehensive 112-piece first aid kit – because safety doesn't cut corners. Waterproof Warrior: Sealed, secured, and built to withstand the journey – this kit laughs in the face of water and challenges, ensuring your first aid supplies stays as tough as you do.

2 Eye Pads -- 1 First Aid Guide -- 2 Pair Medical Gloves -- 1 Tweezer -- 1 Kit Scissor -- 1 Burn Dressing 4x4 -- 1 Triangular Bandage -- 1 CPR Faceshield -- 1 Cold Pack -- 1 Adhesive Tape -- 10 Cotton Tips -- 2 Gauze Pads 3x3 -- 2 ABD Pads 5x9 -- 10 Burn Gel Packets -- 2 Eye Wash 1/2 oz -- 1 Gauze Roll 2 Inch -- 5 Junior Bandages -- 3 Spot Bandages -- 16 Fabric Bandage Strips -- 3 Butterfly Closures -- 3 Fingertip Bandages -- 3 Knuckle Bandages -- 3 Patch Bandages -- 6 Alcohol Pads -- 10 Antiseptic Wipes -- 10 Hand Sanitizer Packets -- 10 Antibiotic Ointment -- 3 Sting Relief Pads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: I am required to have a kit in my vehicle that meets DOT. This kit fits the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall I liked this product and would buy it again. Not very ascetic and the contents is in a single use cheap plastic bag separator. replaced the front sticker with a generic Red Cross logo but other than that great for under the counter or in a car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Awesome first aid and very sturdy. Perfect for autos and trucks comes with hanging brackets. Would recommend to anyone wanting a tough first aid kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good seller good product
reviews.reviewText: Needed product, good product, great seller good communication very happy with purchase. Would definitely do business again-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for shop.
reviews.reviewText: Basic first aid kit. Nothing fancy but it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and restock able in a Steel box, great for off road !
reviews.reviewText: No cheap plastic first aid kit here ! DOT approved ! great for construction, off road, or on highway !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars overall, good but some broken contents
reviews.reviewText: the steel container is robust and well-made. the contents are loaded in plastic bags but no compartments or boxes to separate the contents. the single use ice pack was burst in the box which soaked everything in the saline solution. The items wrapped in paper, not plastic, were ruined. Disappointed but not worth the effort or time to reurn for a few small bandages
